thread.title: Starnes: America's Kids Got More Stupid in Reading, Math and Science while Team Obama was in Charge
thread.title_full: Starnes: America's Kids Got More Stupid in Reading, Math and Science while Team Obama was in Charge

title: Starnes: America's Kids Got More Stupid in Reading, Math and Science while Team Obama was in Charge

organizations.name: organization for economic cooperation and development

text:
Starnes: America's Kids Got More Stupid in Reading, Math and Science while Team Obama was in Charge Published February 8, 2017 AP 
By Todd Starnes | Fox News Opinion 
American school kids became more stupid under the Obama administration, according to rankings released by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development. 
They recently released the results of a worldwide exam administered every three years to 15-year-olds in 72 countries. The exam monitors reading, math and science knowledge. 
Click here to learn how to take back your local public school! 
Based on their findings, the United States saw an 11-point drop in math scores and nearly flat levels for reading and science. 
The Land of the Free, Home of the Brave, fell below the OECD average â€“ and failed to crack the top ten in all three categories.
